name: Prior acquisitions
text:
Any acquisition of a hospital before July 20, 1998 and any acquisition in which an application for a certificate of need has been granted by the agency before July 20, 1998 is not subject to this part. [L 1998, c 257, pt of §1]
Revision Note
  "July 20, 1998" substituted for "the effective date of this part".
